title: Base Racial Speed
content:
Base Racial Speed Effect The base movement speed per turn is 9m for all but Dwarves, Gnomes and Halflings who move 7.5m, and Wood Elves and Wood Half-Elves who move 10.5m per turn. Requirements Any Race

Base Racial Speed

The base movement speed per turn is 9m for all but Dwarves, Gnomes and Halflings who move 7.5m, and Wood Elves and Wood Half-Elves who move 10.5m per turn.

Base Racial Speed is a Trait in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depend
